update.foreach:
update user_tbl
name=#{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
consultant=#{item.consultant,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
consultant_id=#{item.consultantId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
phone_number=#{item.phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
verification=#{item.verification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password=#{item.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
